Title: 14.1 Built-In Function and Operator Reference
14.7 Date and Time Functions
Description:
Returns the year for date, in the
          range 1000 to 9999, or
          0 for the “zero” date. Returns
          NULL if date is
          NULL.

Press CTRL+C to copy mysql> SELECT YEAR('1987-01-01');
        -> 1987
